attributes.action: Cancel A-Level’s 2021 and base it on teacher predictions!
attributes.additional_details: We were neglected and the teachers were focusing more on the year 13s... we don’t have any work experience we didn’t get the chance to visit universities or were even able to plan ahead!
attributes.background: Cancel them completely! The year 12s were neglected and are now being made to do exams. This is ridiculous and we shouldn’t have to go through this we didn’t ask for Covid!

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Cancel GCSEs and A Levels in 2021: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/326066

Work with regulators and exam providers to clarify exam arrangements for 2021: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/312570

Triple Lock for 2021 A Levels Exam Results: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/548555
